Description.val: The Aircraft Survivability Equipment (ASE) budget line includes ASE Laser Countermeasures (AZ3508), ASE Trainers (AZ3506), and ASE Radio Frequency Countermeasures (AZ3511).

OverallHistoryPlanningRemarks.val: The increase in unit price for the B-kits in FY12 reflects the beginning of a procurement mix of both 4 and 6 sensor B-Kits for installation on different aircraft platforms.
